title: Google Collaborates With Agri-tech Firm To Bring Technology-Led-Solutions To India’s Farmland - Krishi Jagran
content: Google Collaborates With Agri-tech Firm To Bring Technology-Led-Solutions To India’s Farmland  Krishi Jagran
description: Google and nurture.farm have proposed a number of research projects to help accelerate the adoption of sustainable agricultural practices across the country.
